```{r selection}
df.processed <- df %>% 
  mutate(
    Gender = ifelse(
      Gender == 1,
      "Female",
      "Male"
      )
  ) %>% 
  filter(
    !is.na(`1a_pre`)
  ) %>% 
  select(
    Gender,
    Age,
    Weight = Todays_Weight,
    MaxWeightLost,
    pWeightLost
  )

```


# Descriptives

```{r}
tab1 <- compareGroups::compareGroups(
   ~ . - Site - Time - ID - Group - StudyID,
  data = df.processed
  )

compareGroups::createTable(
  tab1
  )

```

# Regression

```{r}
model <- glm(formula = `1a_pre` * `2a_pre`, data = df.processed, family = binomial) %>% summary()
```
